com.vangav.backend.system

Class SystemInfoInl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.system.SystemInfoInl

  • public class SystemInfoInl
extends java.lang.Object
    SystemInfoInl: static inline methods for getting info about the system on which this process is running

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SystemInfoInl.ByteMetric
      enum ByteMetric lists storage metric types (byte, kilobyte, megabyte, ...)
      static class  SystemInfoInl.OsType
      enum OsType: Operating System type (Max, Unix, etc ...)
